description: G. A. Dayapala Vs M. S. Sajeeda Banu And others before Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J
parties: G. A. Dayapala Vs M. S. Sajeeda Banu And others
judgement_by: Hon. M. Sampath K. B. Wijeratne J
keywords: Writ of certiorari and mandamus, Permit issued under the LDO,  Nominee succeeded,  Subsequent cancellation,  Alleged that no notice was given,  Refused to accept notices issued by post,  No procedural impropriety,  Breach of the conditions of the permit,  Issuance of writ refused.
legistation: Sections 106, 107, 108 (1), 109 of the Land Development Ordinance
